title: Part 940 - PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENTS WITH COVERED OFFICIALS: PERMISSIBLE AND PROPER USAGE
content:

State Regulations
§ 940.1 - Purpose
§ 940.2 - Definitions
§ 940.3 - Public Service Announcements
§ 940.4 - Public Service Announcements Excluded as Gifts Under Parts 933 and 934
§ 940.5 - Appearance by a covered official in a public service announcement in the 90 days prior to an election

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
